{"id":1291719565,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1718657135,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1160 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1291719565/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"293.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        set<vector<int>> ans;\n\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int l=0, r=N-1; l<i && r>i; ) {\n                if (nums[l] + nums[r] > -nums[i]) r--;\n                else if (nums[l] + nums[r] < -nums[i]) l++;\n                else {\n                    ans.insert({nums[l], nums[i], nums[r]});\n                    l++, r--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        vector<vector<int>> ret;\n        for (auto i : ans) \n            ret.push_back(i);\n\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
